CommentBody:
On Escalation Ticket # 00437858 the new comment has been added: Krzysztof Staszalek:

@Gerrit Lansing can you help with official answer here.
fyi @Cecilia-Maria Iepure @Cristian-Alexandru Halmajan

[DevOps CommentId:11743758]

On Escalation Ticket # 00437858 the new comment has been added: Gerrit Lansing:

@Krzysztof Staszalek Reviewed by Jeremy and I:

Netwrix has obtained extended life support for Ubuntu 18, and thus
 these instances receive security updates. If preferred, Netwrix can 
migrate your instance to one running Ubuntu 22. Netwrix is aware of the 
out-of-date PHP version and the Endpoint Protector development team is 
actively working on a project to update, in phases, to a supported 
version of PHP. We anticipate the first phase of these updates to occur 
within 4 months.

[DevOps CommentId:11754805]

On Escalation Ticket # 00437858 the Following Fields have been updated: 
Status has been changed to Awaiting Escalating Engineer.

On Escalation Ticket # 00437858 the new comment has been added: Krzysztof Staszalek:

@WaitingOnEngineer
Please find response from Security and Product team:
"
Netwrix has obtained extended life support for Ubuntu 18, and thus these instances receive security updates. If preferred, Netwrix can migrate your instance to one running Ubuntu 22. Netwrix is aware of the out-of-date PHP version and the Endpoint Protector development team is actively working on a project to update, in phases, to a supported version of PHP. We anticipate the first phase of these updates to occur within 4 months."

[DevOps CommentId:11760571]
